column1:
share on x rg ray gonzalesjun 21 at 3:09 pm my condolences to johnnie's family. i know how deeply, deeply sad one feels at the loss of a loving spouse. he was a high school classmate of mine. may his soul rest in peace-- as we all believe in heaven. god bless. raymond (ray) gonzales '57. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x mp manuel padilla. jun 21 at 2:21 pm we're the padilla's a couple houses down to the east of you same side of the street.. although we don't know you well always waving when you pass means a lot. we'll miss that. john seemed to enjoy home improvement & spending time with his grandchildren. god bless & let us know if there's anything we can do. manuel padilla 610-8327. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x kc karen caey carrejo. jun 21 at 9:41 am ida mae, my dear friend phyllis, sandra, renne and johnny boy. i was shocked and saddened to hear about johnny. my heart felt codences go out to each and every one of ypu and your families. may the memories of your husband, father and grandfather bring you peace during this difficult time. our thoughts and prayers are with you. god bless. karen casey-carrejo. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x sh shelia hocker. jun 20 at 6:14 pm on behalf of the french family of companies, we express our deepest condolences. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 22. 9:30 am our lady of the most holy rosary church5415 fortuna rd nwalbuquerque, nm, usget order flowers now for johnnie's visitation rosary. jun 22. 10:15 am our lady of the most holy rosary church5415 fortuna rd nwalbuquerque, nm, usget order flowers now for johnnie's rosary funeral mass. jun 22. 11:00 am our lady of the most holy rosary church5415 fortuna rd nwalbuquerque, nm, usget order flowers now for johnnie's funeral mass wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook twitter french funerals -
